Content:
How's it going
I have A runny nose
Body aches Dizziness

How many days have you been sick
I have been sick for Three days
A week A day and a half

When will you see the doctor again
I will see the doctor again Next week
At weekend When it is necessary

What have you done to recover quickly
I have  
Taken vitamins
Got enough sleep
Eatenhealthy food

How can I assist you
You can help me by  
Doing some errands
Bringing some food
Making some tea

What do you have to avoid after recovering from sickness
I have to avoid  
Unhealthy food
Alcohol
Poor sleep habits

Where do you think you lost your wallet
It must have fallen out of my pocket while I was  
Going sightseeing
Getting on the bus
Boarding the train

How much money do you need
I think around should be enough for now 
One hundred twenty bucks
One hundred euros
Two hundred thousand won

Where do you need the money
I need the money  
Right now
As soon as possible
Quickly

When will you pay me back
I promise I will pay you back  
As soon as I can
Within the month
On my next payday

Do your coworkers like to goof around
My coworkers  
Enjoy goofing around
Tend to keep to themselves
Only joke around outside of work

Are you an office jokester yourself
As for myself I  
Enjoy teasing coworkers
Use my humor at work to lighten the mood
Am self-aware of not being humorous enough

What do they usually joke about
They often joke about  
Everyday office situations
Ridiculous moments in meetings
Our work habits

How do you feel about those jokes
I find the office jokes  
Good for mental health at work
Inappropriate
Relaxing

When do you say the joke has gone too far
It is when a joke becomes  
Sexist
Mean-spirited
Privacy-invasive

What should you do when the jokes cross the line
When that happens I will  
Be upfont about their bad jokes
Express how I feel about their jokes
Report it to a supervisor for further resolution

Do your relatives often ask you about marriage
They ask me about marriage 
Consistently
Always
Often

How do you feel when they ask you about it
It makes me feel  
Stressed out
Annoyed
Embarrassed

Do they care about you when they ask that
In my opinion they just ask out of  
Curiosity
Social courtesy
Care

How should we respond when someone asks about marriage
I usually  
Keep the conversation humorous
Change subjects
Feign ignorance

Do you think we should rush into marriage
Definitely not  It depends on  
The financial situation
Mental preparation
The couple's compatibility

Do you have any plans in the next coming years
I plan to focus on in the next comig years 
Building my career
My personal growth
Pursuing my passion
